amptp.name: AMP (Tropical Punch)
amptp.description: AMP flavor regionally released in 2016 and discontinued in 2018.

ccherry.name: Citrus Cherry
ccherry.description: Half-diet, regional since 2014. Released nationally for a limited time in 2016 and 2018.

nz_cred.name: Code Red (NZ)
nz_cred.description: Citrus-berry-cola flavor released to New Zealand in 2009.

cyclone.name: Cyclone
cyclone.description: Citrus punch fountain flavor released in 2019 to Speedway gas stations.

dcred.name: Diet Code Red
dcred.description: Sugar-free cherry flavor nationally released in 2002 and is currently a regional offering.

gblast.name: Game Blast
gblast.description: Citrus-cherry flavor released to Sweden in 2015 and discontinued in 2020.

gfcc.name: Game Fuel (Citrus Cherry)
gfcc.description: Released in 2007 and years following as an LTO. Full-sugar recipe last produced in 2015.

gfccb.name: GAME FUEL (Cherry Burst)
gfccb.description: New-generation GAME FUEL flavor nationally released in 2019.

hbrew.name: Holiday Brew
hbrew.description: Cherry-citrus flavor; a literal Code Red and Original DEW mix. Released LTO in 2017.

mmashup.name: Merry Mash-Up
mmashup.description: Cranberry pomegranate flavor released for a limited time in 2018, 2019, and 2020.

sblast.name: Sangrita Blast
sblast.description: Citrus punch fountain flavor at Taco Bell from 2013-2017. Nationwide LTO store release in 2015.

sflare.name: Solar Flare
sflare.description: Tropical punch fountain flavor at 7-Eleven since 2014. Currently offered at few 7-Eleven locations.

sshock.name: Southern Shock
sshock.description: Tropical punch fountain flavor at Bojangles since 2020.

bpunch.name: Baja Punch
bpunch.description: Baja Blast-inspired punch flavor released for a limited time in 2021.

gfmh.name: Game Fuel (Mango Heat)
gfmh.description: Spicy half-diet mango haba√±ero flavor released LTO in the US in 2016 and Canada in 2017.

gfrc.name: Game Fuel (Raspberry-Citrus)
gfrc.description: Released for a limited time in the UK in 2012 and 2013.

gfcos.name: GAME FUEL (Orange Storm)
gfcos.description: New-generation GAME FUEL flavor nationally released in 2019.

gfcs.name: GAME FUEL (Courageous Sherbet)
gfcs.description: New-generation GAME FUEL flavor released as an online-order-exclusive in 2021.

gfzcs.name: GAME FUEL ZERO (Courageous Sherbet)
gfzcs.description: New-generation sugar-free GAME FUEL flavor released as an online-order-exclusive in 2021.

ksborange.name: Kickstart (Blood Orange)
ksborange.description: Nationally released in 2016 and discontinued in 2018.

livewire.name: LiveWire
livewire.description: Orange flavor released LTO to the US in 2003/04/05. Currently a regional offering. Sold in NZ, MY.

fi_snova.name: Supernova (Finland)
fi_snova.description: Raspberry lemon flavor released to Finland in 2012. Colloquially known as "Euronova."

typhoon.name: Typhoon
typhoon.description: Strawberry pineapple flavor nationally available as an LTO in 2010 and 2011.

bflash.name: Baja Flash
bflash.description: Pineapple coconut flaor released for a limited time in 2021.

gfl.name: Game Fuel (Lemonade)
gfl.description: Nationally released for a limited time in 2014.

gfts.name: Game Fuel (Tropical Smash)
gfts.description: Half-diet pineapple mango flavor released for a limited time in 2017.

gfcts.name: GAME FUEL (Tropical Strike)
gfcts.description: New-generation GAME FUEL flavor nationally released in 2019.

jcg.name: Johnson City Gold
jcg.description: Malt flavor released to select Kroger and 7-Eleven stores for a limited time in 2012.

ksmlime.name: Kickstart (Mango Lime)
ksmlime.description: Nationally released in 2017 and discontinued in 2021.

mburst.name: Maui Burst
mburst.description: Released to Dollar General locations in 2019, with a permanent release to select locations in 2020.

risets.name: RISE Tropical Sunrise
risets.description: Tropical pineapple flavor nationally released in 2021.

slemonade.name: Spiked (Lemonade)
slemonade.description: Lemonade and prickly pear flavor nationally released in 2017 and discontinued in 2018.

slightning.name: Sweet Lightning
slightning.description: Peach and honey flavor released to KFC fountains in 2019.

vibe.name: Vibe
vibe.description: Lemon flavor released to Which Wich fountains in 2021.

amp.name: AMP (Original)
amp.description: Citrus AMP flavor nationally released in 2001.

bblast.name: Baja Blast
bblast.description: Tropical lime flavor released to Taco Bell fountains in 2004. Releases to stores as LTO once a year.

bblastzs.name: Baja Blast Zero Sugar
bblastzs.description: Same as above, but sugar-free and released to Taco Bell fountains in 2019.

cblast.name: Citrus Blast
cblast.description: Sugar-free or full-sugar original DEW made for various European countries beginning in 2010.

dmd.name: Diet Mountain Dew
dmd.description: Sugar-free citrus flavor nationally released in 1976 as "Sugar-Free" and renamed to Diet in 1984.

dmdcf.name: Diet Mountain Dew Caffeine-Free
dmdcf.description: Sugar-free and caffeine-free citrus flavor regionally released in 1989.

distortion.name: Distortion
distortion.description: Lime flavor nationally available as an LTO in 2010.

eapple.name: Electric Apple
eapple.description: Original DEW and green apple syrup mixed to order at Villa Pizza beginning in 2014.

gft.name: Game Fuel (Tropical)
gft.description: Released for a limited time in 2011.

gfcod.name: GAME FUEL (Original DEW)
gfcod.description: New-generation GAME FUEL flavor nationally released in 2019.

glabel.name: Green Label
glabel.description: Half-diet green apple kiwi flavor nationally released in 2017 and discontinued in 2019.

kslimeade.name: Kickstart (Limeade)
kslimeade.description: Nationally released in 2014 and discontinued in 2017.

ksodew.name: Kickstart (Original Dew)
ksodew.description: Nationally released in 2018 and discontinued in 2021.

md.name: Mountain Dew
md.description: The original citrus soda we all know and love. First sold with its current taste in 1960.

mdcf.name: Mountain Dew Caffeine-Free
mdcf.description: Caffeine-free citrus flavor regionally released in 1976.

mdx.name: Mountain Dew MDX
mdx.description: Citrus energy drink released in 2005 and discontinued in 2007.

mdrs.name: Mountain Dew Real Sugar
mdrs.description: Formerly known as "Throwback." Regionally available since 2010. Renamed to "Real Sugar" in 2019.

mdzs.name: Mountain Dew Zero Sugar
mdzs.description: Sugar-free citrus flavor nationally released in 2020.

tapple.name: Thrashed Apple
tapple.description: Green apple flavor available at Kroger beginning in September-October 2021.

ablue.name: Atomic Blue
ablue.description: Half-diet blue raspberry lemonade fountain flavor released to Sheetz and Kum & Go locations in 2020.

bmonsoon.name: Berry Monsoon
bmonsoon.description: Half-diet berry lime fountain flavor released to Sam's Club in 2018.

bmonsoonzs.name: Berry Monsoon Zero Sugar
bmonsoonzs.description: Sugar-free berry lime fountain flavor released to Sam's Club in 2021.

bshock.name: Blue Shock
bshock.description: Raspberry citrus flavor released to Malaysia in 2014. Also available in other countries as a freeze.

dberry.name: Dark Berry
dberry.description: Nationally released as an LTO in 2012. Was also available in Romania and Iceland for a time.

dbbash.name: Dark Berry Bash
dbbash.description: Blue raspberry and blackberry flavor released to Applebee's fountains in 2021.

dvoltage.name: Diet Voltage
dvoltage.description: Sugar-free raspberry citrus flavor nationally released as an LTO in 2011.

fbite.name: Frost Bite
fbite.description: Honeydew melon flavor released to Walmart locations in 2020.

fbitezs.name: Frost Bite Zero Sugar
fbitezs.description: Sugar-free honeydew melon flavor released to Walmart locations in 2021.

gfab.name: Game Fuel (Arctic Burst)
gfab.description: Blueberry??? Watermelon??? what the fuck is this??? flavor nationally released as an LTO in 2017.

gfbl.name: Game Fuel (Berry Lime)
gfbl.description: Nationally released as an LTO in 2015.

gfwf.name: Game Fuel (Wild Fruit)
gfwf.description: Nationally released as an LTO in 2009.

gfcbb.name: GAME FUEL (Berry Blast)
gfcbb.description: New-generation GAME FUEL flavor nationally released in 2019.

ksbp.name: Kickstart (Blueberry Pomegranate)
ksbp.description: Nationally released in 2016 and discontinued in 2021.

lbrew.name: Liberty Brew
lbrew.description: Made with "50" cherry- and berry-inspired flavors. Nationally released as an LTO in 2019 and 2020.

revolution.name: Revolution
revolution.description: Wild berry fruit and ginseng flavor nationally released as an LTO in 2008.

risepbb.name: RISE Pomegranate Blue Burst
risepbb.description: Blueberry pomegranate flavor nationally released in 2021.

voltage.name: Voltage
voltage.description: Raspberry citrus and ginseng flavor nationally released in 2008.

blabel.name: Black Label
blabel.description: Dark berry flavor released in 2016 and discontinued in 2020.

dewsa.name: DEW-S-A
dewsa.description: Mixture of Code Red, White Out, and Voltage; released LTO as half-diet in 2017, full-sugar in 2021.

duviolet.name: Diet Ultra Violet
duviolet.description: Sugar-free mixed berry flavor released as an LTO in 2009.

gfeb.name: Game Fuel (Electrifying Berry)
gfeb.description: Berry (supposedly goji and strawberry) flavor released LTO in 2013.

ksg.name: Kickstart (Grape)
ksg.description: Nationally released as Midnight Grape in 2016 and renamed to Grape in 2021.

pblack.name: Pitch Black
pblack.description: Released LTO as a black grape flavor in 2004 and 2011, and as dark fruit 2016-2021. Sold in MY.

pblackii.name: Pitch Black II
pblackii.description: Sour grape flavor released as an LTO in 2005.

risebb.name: RISE Berry Blitz
risebb.description: Acai berry flavor nationally released in 2021.

violet.name: Violet
violet.description: Grape and elderberry flavor released to Japan 2019-2020.

ampsl.name: AMP (Strawberry Limeade)
ampsl.description: AMP flavor regionally released in 2015 and discontinued in 2021.

btwister.name: Berry Twister
btwister.description: Strawberry watermelon (?) flavor released to Circle K Canada locations and discontinued (?) in 2020.

dsnova.name: Diet Supernova
dsnova.description: Sugar-free strawberry melon flavor nationally released as an LTO in 2011 and for one month in 2012.

gfzcrl.name: GAME FUEL ZERO (Raspberry Lemonade)
gfzcrl.description: New-generation sugar-free GAME FUEL flavor nationally released in 2020.

gfzcws.name: GAME FUEL ZERO (Watermelon Shock)
gfzcws.description: New-generation sugar-free GAME FUEL flavor nationally released in 2020.

gcstrawberry.name: Goji Citrus Strawberry
gcstrawberry.description: Half-diet fountain flavor released to certain gas stations and other locations beginning in 2017.

ksrcitrus.name: Kickstart (Raspberry Citrus)
ksrcitrus.description: Nationally released in 2017 and discontinued in 2021.

ksskiwi.name: Kickstart (Strawberry Kiwi)
ksskiwi.description: Nationally released in 2015 and discontinued in 2017.

kswatermelon.name: Kickstart (Watermelon)
kswatermelon.description: Nationally released in 2016 and discontinued in 2018.

mmelonzs.name: Major Melon Zero Sugar
mmelonzs.description: Sugar-free watermelon flavor nationally released in 2021.

spark.name: Spark
spark.description: Raspberry lemonade flavor released LTO to Speedway locations in 2020 and 2021.

srlemonade.name: Spiked (Raspberry Lemonade)
srlemonade.description: Raspberry lemonade and prickly pear flavor nationally released in 2017 and discontinued in 2018.

snova.name: Supernova
snova.description: Strawberry melon and ginseng flavor nationally released as an LTO in 2008 and 2011. (CA: 2013, 2014)
